name: Root Access (Sukafu Team)
description:
In Root Access you are a hacker resolving technologically challenging request from other people. 

Explore the computer’s files and use your skills to complete different missions and show how good you are!

PS: This is just a ludic game, you won’t actual hack anything, sorry Mr. Robot… 

How to play:

Navigate through the game’s interface with your mouse and keyboard,

Credits:

André Santos - Code
Isabela Castro -  Illustration
Lucas Ventura - UX/UI
